doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 31 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 7/29/1986]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 31 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 7/29/1986]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. International Conference on AIDS in Paris finds little hope of a cure, but several effective treatments, including AZT2. National survey by the University of Pennsylvania ranks consensual homosexual acts as a more severe crime than creating a neighborhood disturbance or smoking marijuanaCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine3. Interview with Julian Schroeder, Democratic candidate for New York Congress4. London branch of British Labour Party bans family photos from campaign literature as it unfairly promotes heterosexualism5. Two London men charged with shocking public behavior for kissing at a bus stop6. Andy Humm on the promotion of condoms in the mediaCOMMERCIAL: Urban General Warehouse Sale7. Methodist Church conference supports the protection and assistance of those with AIDS8. Discovery of general protection for cells from the HTLVIII virus announced at the International AIDS conference in Paris9. San Francisco, rate of transmission of AIDS has declined sharply since 1984 due to changes in sexual behavior10. San Francisco, Sandra Day O'Connor's visit to city hall prompts protests and police brutalityCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp11. Sports ReportCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine12. Outreach: Conversations with GMHC: Interview with David Summers, AIDS activist with the People with AIDS Coalition13. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. This week in gay history with Jeff BixbyCOMMECIAL: "Manscape" gay magazine2. Brandon Judell on Keith Clark's book "Being Sexual and Celibate" and the Meese Commission on Pornography, with clips3. Repeat of Judell's interview with journalist and writer Michael Musto4. Report on AIDS in the workplaceCOMMERCIAL: Body Mate exercise equipment5. San Francisco Gay Pride Parade footage6. Closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 31 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 7/29/1986]: July 1986
